


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isRegexp -->

# ```js isRegexp ```


Check if the passed value is a js Regexp

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isRegexp from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/regexp'
if (isRegexp(/^hello$/g) {
  // do something
}
```
